channel.title: My Simple P0w3r M1n3r

item.title: My Simple P0w3r M1n3r
item.dc:creator: @Jei_Jei_KK Jei Jei KK
item.description:
@Jei_Jei_KK wrote:

[quote=“slinkyman24, post:1, topic:28883”]well ive been learning some scripting and next im gonna step it up after this one. Some of this script was taken from my power Woodcutter.

folow these instructions
1.Set colors
2.Click Run
3.Do whatever you want

copy and paste this into scar.

[scar]program Power_Miner;

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/Skill/Mining}

Var
(refrencecol, tol, tol2: Integer): Boolean;
GasCheck(gx, gy: Integer): Boolean;
FindPickHeadColor: Boolean;

const
username = ‘mememe’;//username
password = ‘notme’;//password
orecolor = color here;//ore color

Procedure Setup;
begin
SetupSRL;
SetupSRLMining;
findpickheadcolor;
end;

Procedure Mine;
begin
findpickheadcolor;
movemousespiral(orecolor,4,4,524,256)
if (isuptext(‘mine’)then
clickmouse(x,y)
wait(3000)
until(invfull)
if(invfull)then
dropto(1,28)
end;

begin
setup;
repeat
mine;
end;

end.
[/scar][/quote]

Did you even try compiling that? Loaded with bugs.
[scar]
program Power_Miner;

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/Skill/Mining.scar}

const
username =‘mememe’;//username
password =‘notme’;//password
Orescolor =0000;//ore color

Procedure Setup;
begin
SetupSRL;
SetupSRLMining;
findpickheadcolor;
end;

Procedure Miner;
begin
repeat
findpickheadcolor;
Findcolorspiral(x,y,orescolor,4,4,524,256);
if (isuptext(‘mine’))then
Clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(3000)
until(invfull)
if(invfull)then
dropto(1,28)
end;

begin
setupsrl;
setupsrlmining;
repeat
miner;
until(false)
end.
[/scar]
Fixed somehow that it compiled.

Read full topic

item.title: My Simple P0w3r M1n3r
item.dc:creator: @slinkyman24 slinkyman24
item.description:
@slinkyman24 wrote:

well ive been learning some scripting and next im gonna step it up after this one. Some of this script was taken from my power Woodcutter.

folow these instructions
1.Set colors
2.Click Run
3.Do whatever you want

copy and paste this into scar.

[scar]program Power_Miner;

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/Skill/Mining}

Var
(refrencecol, tol, tol2: Integer): Boolean;
GasCheck(gx, gy: Integer): Boolean;
FindPickHeadColor: Boolean;

const
username = ‘mememe’;//username
password = ‘notme’;//password
orecolor = color here;//ore color

Procedure Setup;
begin
SetupSRL;
SetupSRLMining;
findpickheadcolor;
end;

Procedure Mine;
begin
findpickheadcolor;
movemousespiral(orecolor,4,4,524,256)
if (isuptext(‘mine’)then
clickmouse(x,y)
wait(3000)
until(invfull)
if(invfull)then
dropto(1,28)
end;

begin
setup;
repeat
mine;
end;

end.
[/scar]
